title: David Brooks: ‘Trump Needs to Decide If He Prefers to Resign, Be Impeached or Get Assassinated’
subtitle: An article reporting that a prominent New York Times columnist floated the idea of assassinating Donald Trump is a hoax.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: New York Times columnist David Brooks said that Donald Trump needed to decide if he'd rather 'resign, be impeached, or get assassinated.'
